testsuite.name: NFS v3 TCP - Special Test 2

failure.message:
sh ./runtests -s -t /mnt/elm3c40.beaverton.ibm.com/elm3c48.test
SPECIAL TESTS: directory /mnt/elm3c40.beaverton.ibm.com/elm3c48.test cd /mnt/elm3c40.beaverton.ibm.com/elm3c48.test; rm -f runtests runtests.wrk READWIN.txt Makefile op_unlk op_ren op_chmod dupreq excltest negseek rename holey truncate nfsidem nstat stat stat2 touchn fstat rewind telldir bigfile bigfile2 freesp cp runtests runtests.wrk READWIN.txt Makefile op_unlk op_ren op_chmod dupreq excltest negseek rename holey truncate nfsidem nstat stat stat2 touchn fstat rewind telldir bigfile bigfile2 freesp /mnt/elm3c40.beaverton.ibm.com/elm3c48.test
check for proper open/unlink operation nfsjunk files before unlink: ls: .nfs*: No such file or directory ./nfslIIC1J open; unlink ret = 0 nfsjunk files after unlink: -rw-r--r-- 1 root root 0 Nov 18 13:11 .nfs00000000007d006d00000023 lseek ret 140733955204848; expected 0 special tests failed Tests failed, leaving /mnt/elm3c40.beaverton.ibm.com mounted
